src:
Bajern stiže u Beograd sa novim trenerom!
03 Nov 2019, 21:26 by Zile
Težak poraz Bajerna u susretu sa Ajntrahtom bila je kap koja je prelila čašu.
Uprava bavarskog kluba izgubila je strpljenje i nakon debakla (1:5) odlučila da se zahvali na saradnji treneru Niku Kovaču.
Kratkom objavom na tviteru, „Fudbalski klub Bajern prekinuo je saradnju sa Nikom Kovačom“, klub je potvrdio glasine koje su počele da kruže tokom današnjeg dana.
Loš početak sezone, neubedljive igre u duelima sa slabijim protivnicima kulminirali su debaklom u Frankfurtu pa Hrvata nije mogla da spase ni dupla kruna osvojena prošle sezone.
Dakle izvesno je da će Bajern na meč sa Crvenom zvezdom 26. novembra doputovati sa novim trenerom, a za sada nema nagoveštaja ko bi mogao da nasledi Kovača.
Pored toga, nije poznato ni ko će voditi klub na dve utakmice u narednih sedam dana, protiv Olimpijakosa u Ligi šampiona i Dortmunda u Bundesligi.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Bayern arrives in Belgrade with a new coach!
03 Nov 2019, 21:26 by Zile
Bayern's heavy defeat in meeting Eintracht was a drop that overflowed the glass.
The management of the Bavarian club lost patience and after the debacle (1: 5) decided to thank for the coaching of coach Niko Kovac.
With a short post on twitter, "Bayern football club terminated cooperation with Nico Kovac", the club confirmed the rumors that began to circulate today.
Bad start to the season, unconvincing games in duels with weaker opponents culminated in the Frankfurt debacle, so the Croats could not save even the double crown won last season.
So it is certain that Bayern will arrive with the new coach on November 26 with a new coach, and for now there is no hint as to who could succeed Kovac.
In addition, it is unknown who will lead the club in two games over the next seven days, against Olympiakos in the Champions League and Dortmund in the Bundesliga.
